blogPost.excerpt: EMOJIZ is a fun animated 3D emojis set which will bring joy to your designs or products. Optimized for White & Dark UI. Just drag & drop to your favorite design tool.
blogPost.body: EMOJIZ is a fun animated 3D emojis set which will bring joy to your designs or products. Optimized for White & Dark UI. Just drag & drop to your favorite design tool.
blogPost.title: EMOJIZ - Animated 3D emoji set with source files
blogPost.author: Samuel Briskar

localize.description: EMOJIZ是一个有趣的动画3D表情集，它将为您的设计或产品带来欢乐。为白色和黑暗的用户界面进行了优化。只需拖放到你最喜欢的设计工具。
localize.tagline: 带源文件的3D表情动画集。

localize.description: EMOJIZ是一個有趣的動畫3D表情集，它將爲您的設計或產品帶來歡樂。爲白色和黑暗的用戶界面進行了優化。只需拖放到你最喜歡的設計工具。
localize.tagline: 帶源文件的3D表情動畫集。

previous.excerpt: Learn from the best of the best. Discover more than 194+ hand-curated Product Hunt launch examples categorized into images, product videos, thumbnails and first comments. Get ideas and inspiration for your next launch 🚀
previous.title: ProductFlair - Curated Product Hunt launch inspiration, tips, and more

localize.description: 向最好的人学习。发现超过 194 个手工策划的 Product Hunt 发布案例，按图片、产品视频、缩略图和第一条评论分类。为您的下一次发布会获取创意和灵感 🚀。
localize.tagline: 策划产品猎奇发布会的灵感、技巧等。

localize.description: 向最好的人學習。發現超過 194 個手工策劃的 Product Hunt 發佈案例，按圖片、產品視頻、縮略圖和第一條評論分類。爲您的下一次發佈會獲取創意和靈感 🚀。
localize.tagline: 策劃產品獵奇發佈會的靈感、技巧等。

next.excerpt: Vmaker is an all-in-one video messaging tool encompassing a screen/webcam recorder, a player, and an in-built video editor. 📹 Vmaker provides the best-in-class Video Management System that gives a seamless experience with asset management. 📂
next.title: Vmaker for Chrome - Asynchronous video messaging made easy

localize.description: Vmaker是一款集屏幕/网络摄像头录像机、播放器和内置视频编辑器于一体的视频信息传递工具。📹 Vmaker提供了一流的视频管理系统，为资产管理提供了无缝体验。📂
localize.tagline: 异步视频信息传递变得简单

localize.description: Vmaker是一款集屏幕/網絡攝像頭錄像機、播放器和內置視頻編輯器於一體的視頻信息傳遞工具。📹 Vmaker提供了一流的視頻管理系統，爲資產管理提供了無縫體驗。📂
localize.tagline: 異步視頻信息傳遞變得簡單
